github_body:
Map changes:
* #455 Added new neon colored button Map Icons.

Mapping changes:
* #452 Admin: Dungeon settings location has been moved from seeder to file instead (so changes can be done through UI and they will persist during updates).

Bugfixes:
*  Fixed floor selection being empty when in map view.
discord_body:
v3.5.2 (2020/09/12)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.5.2)
Map changes:
    * #455 Added new neon colored button Map Icons.

Mapping changes:
    * #452 Admin: Dungeon settings location has been moved from seeder to file instead (so changes can be done through UI and they will persist during updates).

Bugfixes:
    *  Fixed floor selection being empty when in map view.

Bugfixes:

changes.change: Added new neon colored button Map Icons.
Admin: Dungeon settings location has been moved from seeder to file instead (so changes can be done through UI and they will persist during updates).
Fixed floor selection being empty when in map view.
